en-US.summary: Play blackjack with your friends in this party version of Blackjack! Use training mode to learn as you play!
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell blackjack party to deal
en-US.name: Blackjack Party
en-US.description:
Play blackjack with your friends on Alexa!  You and up to 3 friends can play against the dealer at the same table, optionally using Echo Buttons to keep track of each player's turn.  Each player's bankroll is saved and you can change the group of players from the table each time you play.  Players start with 5,000 dollars in credit and can vary bets from 5 to 1,000 dollars.  Improve your blackjack skills by asking for a suggestion on any hand ("what should I do") or use training mode ("enter training mode"), where Alexa will prompt you with the recommended play on every hand!  This full-featured game has it all - hit, stand, split, double down, and even surrender.

Compare your peak bankroll with other players by saying "read high scores" to hear the leader board for all players on your device.

Have feedback or features you'd like to see?  Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/alexacasinogames!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Allows you to play a game of blackjack with other players on your device. The game keeps each player's state so they can track their progress as they play, if a name is provided for the player when added to the game.
